mapper.select:
SELECT admission.admission_nm, exam.type_nm, exam.exam_date, exam.exam_time, examinee.examinee_cd, examinee.examinee_nm, examinee.dept_nm, examinee.major_nm, hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm, exam_map.virt_no, exam_map.group_nm, score.scorer_nm, score.score01, score.score02, score.score03, score.score04, score.score05, score.score06, score.score07, score.score08, score.score09, score.score10, score.total_score, score.score_dttm FROM exam_map INNER JOIN exam ON exam_map.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd INNER JOIN admission ON exam.admission_cd = admission.admission_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON exam_map.examinee_cd = examinee.examinee_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = exam_map.hall_cd LEFT JOIN score ON exam_map.exam_cd = score.exam_cd AND exam_map.virt_no = score.virt_no
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND exam.exam_nm = #{param.examNm} AND exam.exam_date = #{param.examDate} AND exam.exam_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{param.examTime}, '%T') AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND examinee.major_nm = #{param.majorNm} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND exam_map.virt_no = #{param.virtNo} score.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'
SELECT max(cnt) FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM item GROUP BY exam_cd ) a

select scorer_nm , score01, score02, score03, score04, score05, score06, score07, score08, score09, score10 , date_format(score_dttm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS score_dttm , total_score from score where exam_cd = #{param.examCd} and virt_no = #{param.virtNo} order by scorer_nm
AND score.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'

SELECT exam.exam_cd, exam.exam_nm, MAX(exam_map.virt_no) AS last_virt_no , COUNT(exam_map.virt_no) AS virt_no_cnt, COUNT(exam_map.examinee_cd) AS examinee_cnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attend_map WHERE attend_map.attend_dttm IS NOT NULL AND attend_map.attend_cd = exam_map.exam_cd) AS attend_cnt FROM exam_map INNER JOIN exam ON exam.exam_cd = exam_map.exam_cd WHERE exam.exam_cd = #{examCd} GROUP BY exam.exam_cd, exam.exam_nm

update.if: UPDATE exam_map SET virt_no = #{param.lastVirtNo}, scan_dttm = NOW() WHERE exam_cd = #{param.examCd} AND virt_no IS NULL LIMIT 1

mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT attend_map.examinee_cd, (SELECT paper_cd FROM attend_paper WHERE attend_paper.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd AND attend_paper.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd AND attend_paper.paper_no = 1 ORDER BY reg_dttm DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS eval_cd, (SELECT exam_cd FROM exam_map WHERE attend_paper.examinee_cd = exam_map.examinee_cd) AS exam_cd FROM attend_map INNER JOIN attend_paper ON attend_paper.attend_cd = attend_map.attend_cd AND attend_paper.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd AND attend_paper.paper_no = 1
AND attend_map.attend_cd = #{param.examCd}

SELECT exam_map.examinee_cd, score.scorer_nm, exam_map.virt_no, exam_map.exam_cd, exam_map.eval_cd, score.score01,exam_map.hall_cd FROM attend_map INNER JOIN exam_map ON exam_map.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd INNER JOIN attend_paper ON attend_paper.paper_cd = exam_map.eval_cd LEFT JOIN score ON score.virt_no = exam_map.virt_no
AND score.scorer_nm IS NULL AND exam_map.exam_cd = #{param.examCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score(score01, score_dttm, score_seq, scorer_nm, sheet_no, total_score, virt_no, exam_cd, hall_cd) VALUES (#{param.score01}, NOW(), '1', #{param.scorerNm}, '1', #{param.score01}, #{param.virtNo}, #{param.examCd}, #{param.hallCd})
